text: Detour is a 2013 film directed by William Dickerson. ==Plot== A man must escape from being buried alive inside his Jeep after being hit by a mudslide. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2013 films Category:2013 thriller drama films Category:One-character films Category:2013 independent films Category:Survival thriller films Category:2013 drama films
title: Detour (2013 film)
